attributes.action: speak to Croydon Council and stop the closure of Haling Manor High School - IMPROVE NOT REMOVE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Croydon Council have decided to close this school and build an academy in the north of the borough.

The closure of this school will end up in countless problems such as the teachers having to learn the names and get to know the children and ruin the child-hood education of over 1000 children. I want to go to Haling Manor and not an Academy.   Please speak to the councillors and keep it open! Thank you Deano, year 6 going to year 7 in September 2008.
